Pope John Paul II's predecessor has been named. Pope Benedict XVI is german and was forced into the Hitler Youth at 14, he rarely attended. He served in the Nazi military for two years, but deserted just days before the surrender of Germany. He was a professor of theology in the early 1960's at various universities. Some issues he has took a stand on are euthanasia, abortion, homosexuality and relativism; all of which he opposes.
 
 http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Joseph_Cardinal_Ratzinger
